title: Fivetran's Tobiko Data acquisition aids data transformation
description: The purchase provides the data integration vendor with its own data transformation framework to augment capabilities it provides through integrations with third-party specialists.
content: Data integration specialist Fivetran made its second acquisition of 2025, buying Tobiko Data to add open source transformation capabilities aimed at preparing data for AI and analytics applications.… [+6724 chars]
combined_text: Fivetran's Tobiko Data acquisition aids data transformation. The purchase provides the data integration vendor with its own data transformation framework to augment capabilities it provides through integrations with third-party specialists..
summary: Fivetran acquired Tobiko Data in 2025 to enhance its data transformation capabilities using open source. This acquisition gives Fivetran direct control over data transformation, previously reliant on third-party integrations. The move allows Fivetran to better prepare data for AI and analytics applications, enhancing its overall offering.

title: 5 steps for sustainable data management
description: Data management practices that embrace sustainability principles can streamline data processes, improve data protection and reduce energy consumption.
content: Businesses need to govern, protect, back up and recover data against increasingly sophisticated cyberattacks and growing data requirements for new AI systems. Sustainable data management practices ca… [+7975 chars]
combined_text: 5 steps for sustainable data management. Data management practices that embrace sustainability principles can streamline data processes, improve data protection and reduce energy consumption..
summary: Sustainable data management streamlines processes, improves data protection, and reduces energy consumption. Implementing robust governance ensures data quality, compliance, and better informed AI initiatives. Prioritizing data protection and recovery strengthens resilience against cyberattacks and evolving data demands.

But how often do we stop to think about what happens to the data we leave behind, or the risks that might come with it? Where shopping data goes Retailers often store purchase his….
summary: Online shopping raises concerns about retailers storing purchase history and browsing data, potentially leading to security risks. Understanding privacy settings and limiting data sharing with retailers can help consumers reclaim control over shopping data. Startups must prioritize data security and transparency to build trust and comply with evolving privacy regulations.

title: NAIC Working Group Begins Sculpting a Framework to Assess Third - Party Data and Models | Carlton Fields
combined_text: NAIC Working Group Begins Sculpting a Framework to Assess Third - Party Data and Models | Carlton Fields. jdsupra.com.
summary: The NAIC aims to establish a risk-focused framework for assessing third-party data and models used by insurers. Insurers must demonstrate due diligence in model risk management (MRM) to maintain regulatory compliance. This framework will help regulators ensure fairness and accuracy in data-driven insurance practices.

summary: Kythera Labs saves over $2M annually by using Delta Sharing for data management and transfer. The platform also facilitated secure sharing of 300M patient records, boosting healthcare insight speed.

title: McCormick , Fetterman want to protect US data from Chinese financial firms
combined_text: McCormick , Fetterman want to protect US data from Chinese financial firms. citizensvoice.com.
summary: Senators McCormick and Fetterman aim to protect US data by restricting Chinese financial firms' access. They propose legislation addressing national security concerns related to data collection and storage. The bill highlights growing bipartisan worries about China's influence and data practices.

title: Cisco-Splunk strategy shift unveiled with Data Fabric
description: Cisco Data Fabric emphasizes bringing Splunk analytics to data where it lives, rather than a central ingestion point, and will add more third-party data sources such as Snowflake.
content:

A data fabric architecture provides a unified view of data a… [+6380 chars]
combined_text: Cisco-Splunk strategy shift unveiled with Data Fabric. Cisco Data Fabric emphasizes bringing Splunk analytics to data where it lives, rather than a central ingestion point, and will add more third-party data sources such as Snowflake..
summary: Cisco Data Fabric brings Splunk analytics to data sources, decentralized from a single ingestion point, to improve AI. The architecture emphasizes adding third-party data sources, including Snowflake, to broaden capabilities and insights. The core shift enables users to analyze data residing in various locations for real-time processing.

title: McCormick , Fetterman want to protect US data from Chinese financial firms
combined_text: McCormick , Fetterman want to protect US data from Chinese financial firms. mcall.com.
summary: McCormick and Fetterman aim to protect US data by restricting Chinese financial firms' access. The proposal targets firms handling Americans' financial data, citing national security concerns about potential espionage. Protecting sensitive data became a critical issue, necessitating proactive legislative measures for national security.

title: McCormick , Fetterman want to protect US data from Chinese financial firms
combined_text: McCormick , Fetterman want to protect US data from Chinese financial firms. pottsmerc.com.
summary: Senators McCormick and Fetterman aim to safeguard US data from Chinese financial firms. The senators seek legislation prohibiting firms deemed a national security threat by the US government. This action comes amid rising concerns about potential data access and misuse; China is the main concern.
